fields.summary: Android.CP Update T&C and Privacy policy and SMS policy

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
What to Test:-
 * Requirement is to update all the Policy / TnC URLs present over different portals to point to a centralized place where the policies will be hosted, for different lang codes (like en, es_us & fr).
https://jira.paymentus.io/browse/PROD-5132

 * Add Sms policy and check box whereever SMS is used.

Accounts->Add Account.
Accounts > Edit Account.
Home page -> Autopay Add.
Home Page > Autopay ->Edit.
Home page -> Edit Account.

To do:
Replace T&C, Privacy, Authorization links to
[https://www.paymentus.com/customer-terms-privacy]

resolution.description: Work has been completed on this issue.
resolution.name: Done

worklogs.comment: Tested Updated T&C and Privacy policy.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

Retested and closed.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: Android.SDK:- T&C links read back incorrectly from Talk Back.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Issue1:- T&C links and Authorization terms read back incorrectly from Talk Back in Add payment method(CC/DC, ACH and Branded) and make payment dialog screen. 
It is pronouncing correctly on links but not correctly on checkbox.

Issue2:- It is pronouncing Back button incorrectly. 

Issue3:-nick name screen for APMs -> It is skipping the Header of Payment method that is adjoining to back button on .

fields.summary: Android.SDK:- To test the updated T&C , Privacy Policy and Authorization Agreement.

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
Need to test the updated T&C , Privacy Policy and Authorization Agreement and these link has been updated with [https://www.paymentus.com/customer-terms-privacy/] this link.

What to test:
 * SDK >Add PM [CC,DC] -> T&C , Pivacy Policy   [Terms: [https://ipn.paymentus.com/rotp/www/terms-and-conditions.html] , Privacy: [https://ipn.paymentus.com/rotp/www/privacy-policy.html]]
 * SDK -> Add PM [SAV,CHQ] -> Autorization Agreement  [ [https://ipn.paymentus.com/cp/www/ach-agreement-no-fee.html] ]
 * SDK -> Add Advance PM -> T&C , Pivacy Policy   [Same as CC,DC]
 * SDK -> Make pay -> BottomsheetDialog -> I Authorize -- Payment authorization terms

fields.summary: Update T&c and Privacy policy : CP

issuetype.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Why?
* Requirement is to update all the Policy / TnC URLs present over different portals to point to a centralized place where the policies will be hosted, for different lang codes (like en, es_us & fr).
https://jira.paymentus.io/browse/PROD-5132

* Add Sms policy and check box whereever SMS is used.

Accounts->Add Account.
Accounts > Edit Account.
Home page -> Autopay Add.
Home Page > Autopay ->Edit.
Home page -> Edit Account.


To do:
Replace T&C, Privacy, Authorization links to
https://www.paymentus.com/customer-terms-privacy

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

worklogs.comment:
* Updated Links
* Crash Fix dialog null reference on WebViewActivity.
* Implemented SMS policy checkbox and its validations in Add account and Edit Account.
Added SMS policy checkbox against pay by text, sms, and validations in autopay screens
added screenshots, PR Raised, self testing and release
BillerCongig link updated,release build for testing , updated text msg if checkbox not selected .
Fix drone detekt issues
box appear directly below the email/sms radio boxes but before the “Remind me 2 days in advance of a schedule payment.”

New Requirement - checkbox of SMS policy should be unchecked again if sms is untick.
Edit Mobile resources http links, version update
Tested SMS policy.
Tested

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: AI/ML: Develop Jira Issue Summary Generation Using Summary Chain in LangChain

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
*Summary:*

The task involves creating a system for generating Jira issue summaries using different summary chains like Stuff and Map-Reduce in LangChain integrated with Azure OpenAI. The goal is to explore and implement methods for improving the generated summaries and support two approaches for summary creation:
 # *Bottom-Up Approach:*

 * 
 ** Generate individual issue summaries for each assignee.
 ** Use these individual summaries to create a consolidated team-level summary.

 # *Direct Team Summary:*

 * 
 ** Implement a method to generate a team-level summary directly, without relying on intermediate summaries for each assignee.

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

worklogs.comment: 1. Implemented Map-Reduce with Custom Text Splitter for generating Team summary in one go only.
1. Implemented a step-by-step Map-Reduce process using LangGraph that collapses the summary based on the token limit and generates a structured final summary.

1. Explored the differences between Map-Reduce and Stuff methods, and identified scenarios where each is most suitable. 
2. Analyzed the time taken and output quality generated by the Stuff chain for large inputs. 
3. Worked on streaming the output from the LLM to improve the user experience. 
4. Encountered the error "Token Limit Exceeded per minute" by providing the LLM with inputs exceeding 40,000 tokens.
5. Explored the Error handling mechanism in Langchain to catch the exception for token limit exceeded.

1. Filtered Epic Link field from the JSON Response getting from JIRA API.
3. Made Epic Wise list of the Documents in markdown format to generate the summary.
2. Generated the Epic Wise summary using Map-Reduce in Langchain.
1. Explored methods to run chains in parallel while ensuring the token limit per minute for the LLM is not exceeded.

1. Explored an article on generating summaries for long documents using embeddings and K-Means Clustering.  
2. Reviewed the code for restricting the input tokens to the LLM to 40k per minute.  
3. Investigated different parameters in Azure OpenAI LLM related to tokens.

1. Worked on summarizing Jira issues by tag without the LLM introducing inaccuracies in the tags by incorporating the Tag list in the Prompt.  
2. Worked with the prompt template for providing multiple inputs to the multiple prompts in a single chain. 
2. Worked on implementing streaming using the `load_summary_chain` feature in LangChain.
1. Worked on structured output with llm.

1. Worked on resolving errors caused by using structured output for Jira issue summaries with the Summary Chain.  
2. Explored different techniques to enforce structured and consistent output for Jira issue summaries in LangChain.

fields.summary: Dark Mode support

issuetype.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Description of requirement
Add support of dark mode in the compose design 

Current State
Designs are built in xml layouts so Xml libs are in use.

Expected State
Support Dark mode in compose.

Brief rationale for the change
Use Jetpack compose dark mode instead of XML since it is modern way to create screens and all new samples and components can only be rendered using jetpack compose.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Description of requirement
Implement Designs with new components of compose.

Current State
Designs are built in xml layouts so Xml libs are in use.

Expected State
Create screen in compose as future support is in compose only.

Brief rationale for the change
Use Jetpack compose instead of XML since it is modern way to create screens and all new samples and components can only be rendered using jetpack compose.
